title: Emerald & Kundan Jhumkaalu - The 'Padmaavati' Earrings
materials: Simulated Pearls. Crafted with Hyderabadi polish for lasting luster.
features: These exquisitely crafted Jhumkaalu feature a traditional bell-shaped design, meticulously adorned with intricate Kundan settings. A vibrant emerald gemstone sits atop, adding a touch of regal elegance. The jhumkas are finished with delicate pearl drops, enhancing their timeless appeal. Delicate filigree work and traditional South Indian motifs are incorporated into the design, creating a piece that is both classic and contemporary. 'Kundan' stone setting showcases the craftsmanship from Rajasthan, now blended seamlessly with South Indian designs.
occasions: and other special occasions. Also suitable for modern cocktail events and grand celebrations.
description: These Jhumkaalu combine traditional South Indian aesthetics with modern elegance. The vibrant emerald and the intricate Kundan work make this a truly eye-catching piece. Its superior craftsmanship and durability ensure it will be a cherished heirloom for generations to come. It radiates elegance and luxury fit for royalty, 'Maharani look'
